passive.name: Filter
passive.description: Reduces the damage received by the Pokemon for a short time after it uses a move.

basic attack.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage and {{throwing|knockback}} opposing Pokemon when it hits.

base.name: Fake Out
base.description: Makes the user slap its hands together, {{shoving|knockback}} opposing Pokemon in front of it.

upgrades.name: Confusion
upgrades.description: Attacks straight in front of the user, dealing damage to opposing Pokemon and {{shoving|knockback}} them.

upgrade.description: Continually deals damage while this move is in effect and decreases the movement speed of opposing Pokemon.

upgrades.name: Psychic
upgrades.description: Centers a telekinetic blast on both the user and any guard-swapped opposing Pokemon, damaging all opposing Pokemon caught in the blasts and lowering their Sp. Def for a short time. If an opposing Pokemon is hit by multiple overlapping blasts, that Pokemon is also left {{unable to act|stunned}} for a short time.

base.name: Light Screen
base.description: Creates a wall of light in the designated area that prevents opposing Pokemon from passing. This move has two charges.

upgrade.description: Increases this move's uses by one.

upgrades.name: Barrier
upgrades.description: Creates a translucent wall that prevents opposing Pokemon from passing. This move's cooldown begins after two walls have been placed.

upgrade.description: Continually restores the HP of the user and the ally Pokemon while this move is in effect.

upgrades.name: Guard Swap
upgrades.description: Temporarily swaps the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of another Pokemon when it hits. Swapping with an opposing Pokemon deals damage overtime to them and decreases their movement speed while increasing the user's movement speed for a short time. Swapping with an ally Pokemon increases their movement speed for a short time.

unite.name: Showtime!
unite.description: Has the user jump to the designated location and start a pantomime performance, dealing damage over time to opposing Pokemon in the area of effect and leaving them {{unable to act|stun}} for a short time.
